cms_block.title: FORTIS Home Page Demo 1
cms_block.content:
1

Unlimited Colors

Fully customizable design. You have never seen so many options! Change colors of dozens of elements, apply textures, upload background images...

Read more
2

Responsive Design

12-column grid system. Ultimo can be displayed on any screen. It is based on fluid grid system. If screen is resized, layout will be automatically adjusted...

Read more
3

Mega Menu

Two styles: wide mega menu or classic drop-down menu. You can add any custom content (images, text, HTML) to any category in the catalog...

Read more




{{block type="fortis/product_list_featured" template="catalog/product/list_featured_slider.phtml" category_id="6" product_count="20" breakpoints="[0, 1], [480, 2], [640, 3], [960, 4]" img_width="274" timeout="5000" pagination="1" centered="1" hide_button="1" block_name="Recommended Products"}} {{block type="catalog/product_new" template="catalog/product/new.phtml" products_count="8" breakpoints="[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [768, 4], [960, 5], [1280, 6]" move="1" pagination="1" centered="1" hide_button="1" block_name="New Products in Stock"}} Sample Custom Banner





{{block type="brands/brands" template="infortis/brands/brand_slider.phtml" breakpoints="[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 2], [768, 3], [960, 4], [1280, 5]" timeout="5000" move="1" pagination="1" block_name="Our Brands"}}

cms_block.title: FORTIS Fortis - Fully Responsive Magento Theme | Download
cms_block.content: Add custom content in: CMS > Pages

cms_block.title: FORTIS Home Page Demo 2
cms_block.content:
Unlimited Colors

Customizable design

You have never seen so many options! Change colors of dozens of elements, apply textures, upload background images...

See all features

Responsive Layout

12-column grid

Fortis can be displayed on any screen. It is based on fluid grid system. If screen is resized, layout will be automatically adjusted...

See all features

Mega Menu

Customizable drop-down menu

Two styles: wide mega menu or classic drop-down menu. You can add any custom content (images, text, HTML) to any category in the catalog...

See all features


{{block type="fortis/product_list_featured" template="catalog/product/list_featured_slider.phtml" category_id="6" product_count="20" breakpoints="[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [768, 4], [960, 5]" size="size-s" timeout="5000" pagination="1" centered="1" hide_button="1" block_name="Our Featured Products"}}
{{block type="brands/brands" template="infortis/brands/brand_slider.phtml" breakpoints="[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 2], [768, 3], [960, 4], [1280, 5]" timeout="3000" move="1" pagination="1" block_name="Our Brands"}}
Product Grid

Sample Custom Banners


Here you can see some examples of banners.
Banners can be placed on any CMS page, and in any CMS block. Each banner is a simple image inside a link.

cms_block.title: FORTIS Home Page Demo 3
cms_block.content:
Unlimited Colors

Fully customizable design. You have never seen so many options! Change colors of dozens of elements, apply textures, upload background images...

See all features

Responsive Layout

12-column grid system. Ultimo can be displayed on any screen. It is based on fluid grid system. If screen is resized, layout will be automatically adjusted...

See all features

Mega Menu

Two styles: wide mega menu or classic drop-down menu. You can add any custom content (images, text, HTML) to any category in the catalog...

See all features


{{block type="fortis/product_list_featured" template="catalog/product/list_featured_slider.phtml" category_id="6" product_count="20" breakpoints="[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 2], [768, 3], [960, 4], [1280, 5]" size="size-s" timeout="5000" move="1" pagination="1" centered="1" hide_button="1" block_name="Recommended Products"}} {{block type="catalog/product_new" template="catalog/product/new.phtml" products_count="12" breakpoints="[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 2], [768, 3], [960, 4], [1280, 5]" size="size-s" pagination="1" centered="1" hide_button="1" block_name="New Products in Stock"}} {{block type="brands/brands" template="infortis/brands/brand_slider.phtml" breakpoints="[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 2], [768, 3], [960, 4], [1280, 5]" timeout="5000" move="1" pagination="1" block_name="Product Brands"}}
